name: Rexhame Beach
parking: Weekday: $15, Weekend: $20, Holidays: $20, Residents Annual Fee: $45, (Annual Fee is $40 before April 30)
hours: Monday: 6am - 10pm, Tuesday: 6am - 10pm, Wednesday: 6am - 10pm, Thursday: 6am - 10pm,  Friday: 6am - 10pm, Saturday: 6am - 10pm, Sunday: 6am - 10pm
notes: Rexhame is my favorite beach. It is six miles long and has lots of things to do. There are walking trails, fishing, kayaking, swimming, and lots of wildlife. Family friendly with restrooms and amenities.

name: Sunrise Beach
parking: No public parking and beach access is free.
hours: Monday: 6am - 10pm, Tuesday: 6am - 10pm, Wednesday: 6am - 10pm, Thursday: 6am - 10pm, Friday: 6am - 10pm, Saturday: 6am - 10pm, Sunday: 6am - 10pm
notes: Known for beautiful sunrises. Limited beach space at high tide. Lifeguards on duty Friday through Monday.

name: Burkes Beach
parking: Weekday: $15, Weekend: $20, Holidays: $20, Residents Annual Fee: $45, (Annual Fee is $40 before April 30)
hours: Monday: 6am - 10pm, Tuesday: 6am - 10pm, Wednesday: 6am - 10pm, Thursday: 6am - 10pm, Friday: 6am - 10pm, Saturday: 6am - 10pm, Sunday: 6am - 10pm
notes: Great for families with young kids. Warm bay water, jetty exploration, tide pools with crabs and lobsters. Near General Store and Green Harbor Lobster Pound. Popular bridge jumping spot.

name: Fieldston Beach
photo_credit: North and South Rivers Watershed Association
parking: Limited resident parking on Old Beach Road. Located at the end of Hartford Road.
hours: Monday: 6am - 10pm, Tuesday: 6am - 10pm, Wednesday: 6am - 10pm, Thursday: 6am - 10pm, Friday: 6am - 10pm, Saturday: 6am - 10pm, Sunday: 6am - 10pm
notes: Adjacent to Sunrise Beach and shares its beautiful sunrises. Small at high tide. Mostly used by local residents and vacationers.

name: Brant Rock Beach
parking: Resident sticker parking in specific town lots.
hours: Monday: 6am - 10pm, Tuesday: 6am - 10pm, Wednesday: 6am - 10pm, Thursday: 6am - 10pm, Friday: 6am - 10pm, Saturday: 6am - 10pm, Sunday: 6am - 10pm
notes: Dog friendly, scenic rock formations at low tide, sea wall walking, nearby shops/restaurants/bars, restrooms, beloved jetty.

name: Ocean Bluff Beach
parking: No public parking and beach access is free.
hours: Monday: 6am - 10pm, Tuesday: 6am - 10pm, Wednesday: 6am - 10pm, Thursday: 6am - 10pm, Friday: 6am - 10pm, Saturday: 6am - 10pm, Sunday: 6am - 10pm
notes: Never been!!! On my bucket list.
